channel.title: Title wont change once jarred
channel.description: I am having this problem when i change the title on the client (the window title) it works i compile, but when i go to jar it with jar maker, it goes back to what it was, i looked back in gui.java to see if it changed but it did, so it only happens once i turn it into to a jar...

item.title: Title wont change once jarred
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Is it a Pi the titles in PI’s are in either “RSinterface” or in “RSframe”

Read full topic

item.title: Title wont change once jarred
item.dc:creator: @bradly.s bradly.s@hotmail.com
item.description:
@bradly.s wrote:

I am having this problem when i change the title on the client (the window title) it works i compile, but when i go to jar it with jar maker, it goes back to what it was, i looked back in gui.java to see if it changed but it did, so it only happens once i turn it into to a jar…

Read full topic
